title: RIOT WHERE IS MISTERY CHAMP??
body: Where is mistery champ? :( i need {{champion:421}} {{item:3070}} ********

replies.body: According to the website, the goal is to have them out by EoD day, July 1st.

Edited. xD 

Thanks! I hadn't had my coffee yet. :x
To be fair, it said by july 1st for most people that meant they would be done before now, so it's kind of on whoever wrote that, that so many players are getting uppity,

> [{quoted}](name=Thanotos Omega,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EwW8yRMA,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-07-01T16:22:44.109+0000)
>
> To be fair, it said by july 1st for most people that meant they would be done before now, so it's kind of on whoever wrote that, that so many players are getting uppity,

Yeah but it's across all servers, so it's gonna take quite a bit of time and people don't seem to understand that.

Maybe so, doesn't change the fact that it read like it should have been done by now, and so players are upset because they think Riot missed them, and thus they are supposed to be letting them know they weren't rewarded,
Maybe if I get {{champion:26}} then i can get back all of the time i spent waiting.
They should then just pay more attention and also check out this http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/3VhOeAbf-pool-party-rewards-distribution-on-going
